Movie & Dining: 25% Discount on Movie Bookings With BookMyShow. Up to 25% Discount on Dining at Select Restaurants
Rewards Rate: 12 RPs for every Rs. 200 spent online. 6 RPs per Rs. 200 you spend offline. 4 RPs on select categories like insurance, education, and rental payments.
Reward Redemption: RPs Earned Are Redeemable Through Yes Rewardz (1 RP = Re. 0.25 Against Hotel/Flight Bookings)
Golf: 4 Green Fee waiver and 1 complimentary golf lesson every month at selected golf courses in India
Insurance Benefits: A Credit Shield Cover Worth ₹3 lakhs and Purchase Protection

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Joining Fee Waiver - Spend ₹20,000 within 30 Days of Card Issuance. Annual Fee Waiver on Spends of ₹2 Lakh or More
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% fuel surcharge waiver on fuel transactions between Rs. 400 and Rs. 5,000.

product_details: Get 4 RPs per ₹200 spent on utilities, government services, insurance, education, and rental payments. Get 12 Reward Points per ₹200 spent online. Avail of a discount of 25% on movie tickets through BookMyShow. 3 Complimentary international lounge access per year. 2 complimentary domestic lounge access per quarter. 1 complimentary golf lesson each month. Get your joining & annual fee waived on meeting the spending targets. Low foreign currency markup fee of 2.75%.
